headline: AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
shortBio: AI engineer and full-stack developer focused on building practical, real-world applications using modern web technologies and artificial intelligence.

children.text: Iâ€™m an AI engineer and full-stack developer with hands-on experience building intelligent systems, mobile applications, and scalable backend solutions through internships, hackathons, and real-world projects.

My work spans across modern web and mobile technologies such as React, Next.js, React Native, FastAPI, and Supabase, with a strong focus on integrating AI capabilities into applications to solve meaningful problems.
Outside of development, I actively participate in hackathons, mentor open-source contributors, attend tech meetups, and continuously explore emerging trends in AI and software engineering.
